https://tmrev.io/movie/877680-Cosmópolis 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The documentary Cosmópolis investigates the hectic life of São Paulo through parallels between the city's history and the universes of 12 of its inhabitants: Arab and Jewish merchants, a Bolivian street vendor, northeastern suddentists, a karaoke champion and others, who translate the way of being of this city of extremes. Cosmópolis
